title: Wild: A Story of Inevitable Surrender
description: Iris was born into great dysfunction, she never chose her circumstances, and neither did Jacks her just barely older brother. Helpless to the tantrums of their schizophrenic mother and unheard by their father, the two of them often relied on each other for comfort. A series of bad decisions lead to the both of them trespassing a line they never meant to, one they realize they may never be able to come back from. As she attempts to cope with what is happening, Iris finds herself unexpectedly hung up on a total stranger;
author: Claire Woodhouse
